skills.skill: Scheduling with Primavera P6, MS Project

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive program management plan for larger construction projects.
Identify and deliver program objectives with Project Sponsors, Business Development, Project Development, and Project Delivery Teams.
Works with Project Sponsors, Business Development, Project Development and Project Delivery Teams to identify and deliver program objectives.
Mentor project team and assess training needs to benefit future project leaders.
Evaluate and review overall subcontracting strategies.
Maintain relationships with Principals of major subcontractors.
Oversee monthly performance evaluations of strategic programs and provide reports to management.
Seek and capitalize upon opportunities to increase customer satisfaction and deepen client relationships.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Construction, Civil, Mechanical, Electrical Engineering, Construction Management or Architecture (Master’s degree preferred)
Certification as a PMI Project Management Professional (PMP) is highly preferred
